title: The Greatest Drug Dealer In American History, Stranger Things Is Based On A Real Conspiracy Theory 10.30.17
itunes:title: The Greatest Drug Dealer In American History, Stranger Things Is Based On A Real Conspiracy Theory 10.30.17
description:
In episode 16, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Billy Wayne Davis to discuss Trump drug abuse speech, the Sackler Family & Oxycontin, Stranger Things & the Montauk conspiracy, tabloids, George H.W. Bush & the Harvey effect, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
